summary: Implemented a Python function that converts UNIX timestamps to ISO8601 formatted datetime strings with UTC timezone. The implementation includes proper error handling, type hints, comprehensive documentation, and a test suite covering various scenarios including edge cases.

generated_files.content_description: Main implementation of the unix_to_iso8601 function
key_insights: Handles both integer and float timestamps

Not currently used but available for future enhancements
